title: Sketchbook Folio, "Two drawings of Sybils and Two Putti", recto 1815
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at upper left, on tablet of upper drawing: FAENZA / 1815; at center left: Anibale Caracci Roma; at center right, on tablet of lower drawing: 1815; at lower left margin: 42 Anibale Caracci Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of seated Sybil turned towards left, and writing on tablet; two putti flank her. Lower drawing of seated Sybil facing front but turned towards right and pointing at tablet. Two putti flank her.
